function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Employees facing financial insecurity due to COVID-19 impacting employment and housing","Impact":"Increased stress, decreased morale, and productivity","Mitigation":"Provide emergency grants, special loans, companywide relief funds, or leave without pay incentives","Technologies":"Financial assistance platforms, online grant application systems","People":"Affected employees and their families","Owner":"Human resources, management, and leadership"},{"Description":"Emotional health and well-being of employees at risk due to social distancing and isolation","Impact":"Decreased emotional well-being, increased feelings of loneliness and depression","Mitigation":"Stay connected through virtual engagements, provide structure and routine","Technologies":"Virtual communication platforms, digital engagement tools","People":"Leadership, HR, and employees","Owner":"Leadership and HR"},{"Description":"Shift in priorities from esteem and self-actualization to meeting basic needs during high-stress situations like the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Decreased focus on personal growth, finding meaning, and worth","Mitigation":"Shift focus to meeting basic needs, provide support for personal growth and self-worth when possible","Technologies":"Online training and development platforms, digital self-improvement resources","People":"Leadership and employees","Owner":"Human resources, management, and leadership"}]}
